Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway/Oceancrest Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the busy intersection of Lankshire Parkway and Oceancrest Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: Oceancrest Avenue, running east and west through the intersection, is often considered the central road through Oceancrest. It will eventually end at the Eastern Entrance to the city to the east, and at the Nylandian Bay to the west. Lankshire continues to the north and south, becoming one of the major roads in the southern section of town.
